messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/22/2002 11:27:31 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
rumpleteasermom@... writes:


>
> --- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "joanna514" <Wilkinson6@m...> wrote:
>
> >
> > I bet if you owned a restaurant the wording would mean a heck of a
> > lot to you! :-)
> >
>
> Ooohhhh.... A new name for the girls Cafe - The Dead Cow Cafe!
> They'll love it! Seriously.
>
> > Are you trying to discourage people from talking about thinking
> about
> > their words, and maybe eventually changing their thinking or are you
> > just commenting on how it doesn't apply to you? Either way, why do
> > you have a problem with it?
> > Joanna
>
> No I guess what I am trying to say is that *everyone* needs to
> remember that not all words effect everyone the same way. In fact we
> don't even all use them the same ways.
>
> Bridget
>
